parameters.name: importDevicesParameters
parameters.description: The import devices parameters.

SharedAccessSignatureAuthorizationRule.description: The properties that describe the keys to access the IotHub artifacts.

storageEndpoints.description: The list of storage end points where files can be uploaded. Currently only one storage account can be configured.

messagingEndpoints.description: The list of messaging end points configured.

enableFileUploadNotifications.description: The flag which indicates whether file upload notification should be enabled. This is optional at iot hub level. When enabled upload notifications will be available.

features.description: The Capabilities/Features that need to be enabled for the Hub.

IotHubSkuInfo.description: The Sku related information for the hub.

capacity.description: The number of units being provisioned. Range of values [For F1: 1-1, S1: 1-200, S2: 1-200, S3: 1-10]. To go above this range, call support.

EventHubProperties.description: The properties of the provisioned event hub used by the Iot Hub.

messageRetentionInDays.description: The retention time in days. Range of values [For F1: 1-1, S1: 1-7, S2: 1-7, S3: 1-7].

partitionCount.description: The partition count. Range of values [For F1: 2-2, S1: 2-128, S2: 2-128, S3: 2-128].

StorageEndpointProperties.description: The properties of the Storage Endpoint for file upload.

sasTtlAsIso8601.description: SAS time to live. Range: 1 Min (PT1M) - 1 Day (P1D).

connectionString.description: The account key credentials for storage account selected by customer for uploading files.

containerName.description: The root container name where all files will be uploaded.

MessagingEndpointProperties.description: The properties of the Messaging Endpoints used by this IoT Hub.

lockDurationAsIso8601.description: The lock duration. Range: 5 Sec (PT5S) - 5 Min (PT5M).

ttlAsIso8601.description: The time to live. Range: 1 Min (PT1M) - 2 Days (P2D).

CloudToDeviceProperties.description: The Iot Hub Cloud-To-Device messaging properties.

maxDeliveryCount.description: The max delivery count for the device queue. Range : 1-100.

defaultTtlAsIso8601.description: The default time to live for the device queue. Range : 1 Min (PT1M) - 2 Days (P2D).

lockDurationAsIso8601.description: The lock duration for the feedback queue. Range: 5 Sec (PT5S) - 5 Min (PT5M).

ttlAsIso8601.description: The time to live for the feedback queue. Range: 1 Min (PT1M) - 2 Days (P2D).

resourcegroup.description: The resource group name uniquely identifies the resource group within the user subscriptionId.

etag.description: The Etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal ETag convention.

SharedAccessSignatureAuthorizationRuleLi.description: The list of authorization rules with a next link.

ErrorDetails.description: The properties related to the details of an error.

IotHubQuotaMetricInfoListResult.description: The list of IotHubQuotaMetricInfo objects with a next link.

RegistryStatistics.description: The properties related to the registry statistics.

JobResponseListResult.description: The list of JobResponse objects with a next link.

IotHubSkuDescription.description: The properties related to the Sku.

IotHubCapacity.description: The properties related to the capacity information.

EventHubConsumerGroupsListResult.description: The list of eventhub consumer group names with a next link.

value.description: The list of eventhub consumer group names.

id.description: The event hub consumer group identifier.

name.description: The event hub consumer group name.

IotHubSkuDescriptionListResult.description: The list of IotHubSkuDescription objects with a next link.

JobResponse.description: The properties describing a Job Response.

endTimeUtc.description: Represents the time the job stopped processing.

type.description: The type of job to execute.

failureReason.description: If status == failure, this represents a string containing the reason.

statusMessage.description: The status message for the job.

deviceId.description: The deviceId related to this response.

parentJobId.description: The jobId of the parent job, if any.

IotHubDescriptionListResult.description: The list of IotHubDescription objects with a next link.

IotHubQuotaMetricInfo.description: The properties related to quota metrics.

Name.description: The name of the quota metric.

CurrentValue.description: The current value for the quota metric.

MaxValue.description: The maximum value of the quota metric.

Name.description: The name of the iot hub.

IotHubNameAvailabilityInfo.description: The properties indicating whether a given iothub name is available.

nameAvailable.description: The value which indicates whether the provided name is available.

message.description: The message describing the detailed reason.

ExportDevicesRequest.description: Used to provide parameters when requesting an export of all devices in the hub.

ExcludeKeys.description: The value indicating whether keys should be excluded during export.

ImportDevicesRequest.description: Used to provide parameters when requesting an import of all devices in the hub.
